_comment: GenericCommand System Configuration - Runtime-configurable parameters for the command queue and executor

_usage.queueCapacity: SPSC ring buffer capacity for GenericCommandQueue (default: 500)
_usage.rateLimitPerAgent: Max commands per second per agent via token bucket. 0 = unlimited (default: 100)
_usage.enableAuditLogging: Log every command execution with agent, type, result (default: false)
_usage.enableValidation: Enable JS-side schema validation before C++ submission (default: true)
